content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation (electrical_id: 29524).
- ElectricityGroup (id 29524) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", and "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning "out of fuel"; fluid box holds water (≈189.93 at temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); assigned fluid system 158243.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; fluid box holds water (≈99.25 at temperature 15) on fluid system 158243.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 158243, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 158242, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 158255, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 158254, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 158250, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 158259, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 158258, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 158261, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 158262, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 158263, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inconsistent Fluid System Identifier Usage and Candidate Mismatch:
   - Multiple connection attempts used varied fluid_system identifiers (previously: 156915, 156999, 157081, 157165, 157247, 157331, 157413, 157497; newly attempted: 157579, 157663, 157745, 157829, 157911, 157995, 158077, 158161) near position (-5.5, 19.5). Use a unified, validated fluid_system identifier to ensure candidate pipe groups are consistently recognized.

• Repeated Unsuccessful Candidate Searches:
   - Every connection attempt within a 15-tile radius from position (-5.5, 19.5) returned 0 candidate pipe groups. Incorporate a pre-check for candidate availability and verify the search radius covers valid candidates before initiating connection operations.

• Expected Candidate Not Found:
   - Even when an expected working candidate was specified, no matching pipe group was located. Confirm that the candidate’s configuration, spatial parameters, and fluid system association are accurate before initiating connection attempts.
